statements: SELECT * FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_type FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data WHERE subscription_amount > 100.00
SELECT customer_name, subscription_amount FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium'
SELECT * FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data ORDER BY subscription_start_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_amount FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data WHERE subscription_start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_type, subscription_amount, subscription_start_date FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, subscription_amount FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data WHERE subscription_type = 'Basic' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, subscription_amount FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data WHERE subscription_amount > 100 ORDER BY subscription_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, subscription_amount FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data WHERE subscription_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_type, subscription_amount, subscription_start_date FROM traditional_media_companies_subscription_data WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium' AND subscription_amount > 200 ORDER BY subscription_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE subscription_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, payment_method FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_plan FROM Customer JOIN Subscription ON Customer.customer_id = Subscription.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Subscription WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE subscription_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';

SELECT customer_name, subscription_plan, start_date, end_date FROM Customer c JOIN Subscription s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.subscription_plan = 'Premium' ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name, s.subscription_plan FROM Customer c JOIN Subscription s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(subscription_id), customer_id FROM Subscription GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY COUNT(subscription_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_type, start_date FROM customer_subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM subscription_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, action_date, action_description FROM subscription_history WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM subscription_payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_payment > 500;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_type, end_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'Gold';
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM subscription_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, action_description FROM subscription_history WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM subscription_payments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_payment DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE subscription_type='Premium';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, subscription_price FROM MediaCompany WHERE subscription_price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Payment WHERE amount < 100.00 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE subscription_type='Premium';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, start_date FROM Customer JOIN Subscription ON Customer.customer_id = Subscription.customer_id;
SELECT company_name, subscription_price FROM MediaCompany WHERE subscription_price > 50.00 ORDER BY subscription_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount FROM Customer JOIN Subscription ON Customer.customer_id = Subscription.customer_id JOIN Payment ON Subscription.subscription_id = Payment.subscription_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_type FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT plan_name, plan_price FROM subscription_plans ORDER BY plan_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM subscription_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Renewal' ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, subscription_start_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium'
SELECT customer_name, subscription_end_date FROM customer_subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_end_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT notification_id, notification_type, notification_message, notification_date FROM subscription_notifications WHERE customer_id = 2
